post.author: Steve Kang
post.content:
Please give me a comment of seminar policy if you have.
1. Subscription requirements o Recommender who is a member of seminar group o Fee : $60
2. Withdrawal(Taltae) conditions o His own will o Didn't pay the fee o Below 50% of attendant rate of last session
3. Compensation o Presentation of topic : $30(Credit) o Supporting a place : $30(Credit) * one time(presentation, supporting of a place) per session
* The time limit of payment will be on April 27, 2001. * This draft will be decided as a rule if no objection by April 20, 2001. The valued member also will be updated according to the seminar policy. .
post.title: Seminar policy
